tools.name: data-assimilation
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for data assimilation methods
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python implementations for various data assimilation methods, typically used in geosciences and physics to combine models with observational data.

tools.name: GPJax
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian processes library in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A library for Gaussian processes in JAX and Flax, enabling efficient probabilistic modeling and inference with hardware acceleration.

tools.name: ZhuSuan
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic programming library for Bayesian deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A probabilistic programming library for Bayesian deep learning and generative models, built on Tensorflow, facilitating variational inference and MCMC.

tools.name: torch-assimilate
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch-based data assimilation package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package based on PyTorch and Dask for efficient and parallelized data assimilation of weather model data and observations on GPUs.

tools.name: DynamicHMC.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Robust dynamic Hamiltonian Monte Carlo methods in Julia
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of robust dynamic Hamiltonian Monte Carlo methods (NUTS) in Julia, providing efficient MCMC sampling for Bayesian inference.

tools.name: monad-bayes
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic programming library in Haskell
tools.detailed_description: A library for probabilistic programming in Haskell, allowing the definition and inference of probabilistic models using monads.

tools.name: Orbit
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian forecasting with probabilistic models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for Bayesian forecasting with object-oriented design, utilizing probabilistic models for time series analysis and inference.

tools.name: UCNLNav
tools.one_line_profile: Library for navigation and geodetic problem solving
tools.detailed_description: A multilanguage library (C#/Matlab/Rust) for solving 2D/3D navigation and geodetic problems, including multilateration, TOA/TDOA/AOA calculations, and inverse geodetic problems.

tools.name: Harissa
tools.one_line_profile: Gene regulatory network simulation and inference tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the simulation and inference of gene regulatory networks based on a mechanistic model of transcriptional bursting.

tools.name: uncertainty-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for predictive uncertainty quantification and calibration
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed for predictive uncertainty quantification, calibration, metrics calculation, and visualization of uncertainty in machine learning models.

tools.name: bayadera
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated Bayesian data analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance library for Bayesian Data Analysis on the GPU using Clojure, enabling fast probabilistic inference.

tools.name: Peregrine
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation-based inference library for gravitational wave signals
tools.detailed_description: A simulation-based Inference (SBI) library designed to perform analysis on a wide class of gravitational wave signals, facilitating parameter estimation in astrophysics.

tools.name: swyft
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable simulation-based inference system
tools.detailed_description: A system designed for scientific simulation-based inference at scale, utilizing neural networks to estimate posterior ratios efficiently.

tools.name: PEST++
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for parameter estimation and uncertainty analysis
tools.detailed_description: A suite of software tools for scalable and non-intrusive parameter estimation, uncertainty analysis, and sensitivity analysis, widely used in environmental and groundwater modeling.

tools.name: pyMCR
tools.one_line_profile: Multivariate Curve Resolution library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Multivariate Curve Resolution (MCR), used for analyzing mixture data in spectroscopy and chemistry to resolve pure component spectra and concentrations.

tools.name: OMEGA
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-dimensional tomographic reconstruction software
tools.detailed_description: Open-source software for multi-dimensional tomographic reconstruction, facilitating the solving of inverse problems in imaging.

tools.name: marginaleffects
tools.one_line_profile: R package for model predictions and marginal effects
tools.detailed_description: An R package to compute and plot predictions, slopes, marginal means, and comparisons for statistical models, including support for simulation-based inference and uncertainty estimates.

tools.name: Generalised-Gaussian-Processes
tools.one_line_profile: Fully Bayesian inference framework for Gaussian Processes with generic likelihoods
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing fully Bayesian inference in Gaussian Processes, supporting both Gaussian and generic likelihood functions for flexible modeling.

tools.name: sbi_pp
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation-based inference tool customized for astronomical applications
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for simulation-based (likelihood-free) inference, specifically tailored for astronomical data analysis and photometric redshift estimation.

tools.name: FreeBird.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Free energy calculator using Bayesian-inspired nested sampling
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for calculating free energy using Bayesian-inspired nested sampling and other integration techniques, designed for physics and chemistry applications.

tools.name: ptemcee
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel-tempered ensemble MCMC sampler
tools.detailed_description: A parallel-tempered version of the emcee MCMC sampler, designed to improve sampling in multimodal distributions for scientific inference.

tools.name: DAFI
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble-based data assimilation and field inversion library
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for ensemble-based data assimilation and field inversion, supporting various Kalman filter variants and ensemble smoothers for physical simulations.

tools.name: X-PSI
tools.one_line_profile: X-ray Pulse Simulation and Inference pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A package for X-ray Pulse Simulation and Inference, designed to model the X-ray emission from neutron stars and perform parameter inference.

tools.name: SurfATT-iso
tools.one_line_profile: Surface wave Adjoint Travel-time Tomography tool
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based tool for Surface wave Adjoint Travel-time Tomography, used in geophysics for imaging subsurface structures.

tools.name: scrna-parameter-estimation
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter estimation tool for single cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the direct estimation of mean and covariance parameters from single cell RNA sequencing experiments, aiding in the statistical analysis of gene expression.

tools.name: TensorVar
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient four-dimensional variational data assimilation tool
tools.detailed_description: A library for efficient four-dimensional variational (4D-Var) data assimilation, utilizing tensor operations for performance optimization in geophysical modeling.

tools.name: inn-surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse problem solver using conditional invertible neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for solving scientific inverse problems by using conditional invertible neural networks (cINNs) as surrogate models.

tools.name: Omega.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Causal, higher-order probabilistic programming language
tools.detailed_description: A probabilistic programming language embedded in Julia, supporting causal inference and higher-order probabilistic modeling.

tools.name: zfit
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable model manipulation and fitting library for High Energy Physics
tools.detailed_description: A model manipulation and fitting library based on TensorFlow, optimized for simple and direct manipulation of probability density functions, primarily for High Energy Physics analysis.

tools.name: pyeq2
tools.one_line_profile: Large collection of equations for curve and surface fitting
tools.detailed_description: A library providing a large collection of equations for curve fitting and surface fitting, including genetic algorithms for initial parameter estimation.
